transcript.text: We operate in a fast-paced industry. Knowing more about what competitors are doing is vital to our success. But we must gather this information in ethical and legal ways. In this module, learn how to obtain competitive intelligence fairly.

contentBackground.img: A group of employees in a company office building.

panelText.text: Competitive intelligence – or “market intelligence” – is any information that helps us understand our competitors and position ourselves against them. It helps us identify trends and opportunities in the market.

Although competitive information can be helpful to our business, you must gather this information in legal and ethical ways. Johnson Controls does not accept or use information that’s gathered inappropriately.
